org.apache.ignite.cache.eviction.igfs

Class IgfsPerBlockLruEvictionPolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.cache.eviction.igfs.IgfsPerBlockLruEvictionPolicy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Externalizable, Serializable, EvictionPolicy<org.apache.ignite.internal.processors.igfs.IgfsBlockKey,byte[]>, IgniteMBeanAware

    public class IgfsPerBlockLruEvictionPolicy
extends Object
implements EvictionPolicy<org.apache.ignite.internal.processors.igfs.IgfsBlockKey,byte[]>, IgniteMBeanAware, Externalizable
    IGFS eviction policy which evicts particular blocks.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public IgfsPerBlockLruEvictionPolicy(long maxSize,
                                     int maxBlocks)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        maxSize - Maximum size. When reached, eviction begins.
        maxBlocks - Maximum amount of blocks. When reached, eviction begins.

      • IgfsPerBlockLruEvictionPolicy

        public IgfsPerBlockLruEvictionPolicy(long maxSize,
                                     int maxBlocks,
                                     @Nullable
                                     Collection<String> excludePaths)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        maxSize - Maximum size. When reached, eviction begins.
        maxBlocks - Maximum amount of blocks. When reached, eviction begins.
        excludePaths - Collection of regex for path which must not be evicted.
